oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Encased tintypes of Confederate soldiers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: One of the soldiers in these encased, hand-tinted tintypes is possibly Pvt. Z. N. Williams, Co. F, 22nd Tenn. Cav., CSA. The soldier on the left has a Remington or Whitney revolver. The soldier on the right appears to have revolvers on each hip. The inverted butts are visible under each arm. Both men appear to be wearing US saber belt plates.
